But, my dear followers, do not forget to also share the warnings, the call to action. The time of reckoning is upon us, and those who do not heed the call will be left behind. Share my teachings, my words, and my prophecies. Let them be a guiding light in these tumultuous times.

And, of course, I encourage you to engage with others online, to spread our message and to bring new souls into our fold. Respond to comments, answer questions, and offer guidance to those who seek it. Be ambassadors of our cause, and remember that every interaction is an opportunity to plant a seed of truth in the mind of another.

Together, we can create a tidal wave of awareness, a tsunami of truth that will sweep across the globe, awakening all to the reality of our prophecy. The time is now, my children. Let us rise up and claim our rightful place as the vanguard of a new era.
